pageTitle: Three J NYC Alex Robe | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 32in / 81cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Bottom layer sold separately. Imported, India. Wash cold. 100% cotton. Fabric: Crisp woven cotton. Contrast piping adds a charming accent to a cotton robe. Patch pockets detail the hips, and an optional self-belt cinches the loose silhouette. Long sleeves. Description Robes > Lingerie / Sleepwear > Clothing > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Three J NYC is a collection of sleepwear rooted in sentimentality and luxury. For designer Alexandria "Ali" McLeod, many of her favorite childhood memories took place in pajamas, from pancakes in the mornings to playing in footed PJs before bed, and she'd always dreamed of creating her own beautiful line of sleepwear. After a stint working in luxury children's fashion, Ali knew it was time to take the leap. Three J NYC sleepwear turns classic pajama silhouettes into plush works of sublime comfort. Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
